title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Roadmap Update - WU's, AAU's and more
description:
This video provides a recap of the announcements from the latest MSFS 2020 developer webcast. Exciting updates are on the horizon, with some arriving as early as next week, while others will take a bit more time. We delve into World Update XVIII extensively, showcasing numerous screenshots that were shared during the webcast.

So, sit back, relax, and prepare to be amazed!

0:00 intro
0:10 Top Gun Maverick pack
1:08 Sim Update 16 and AAU 3
3:01 World Update XVIII: Germany, Austria and Switzerland
3:30 World Update XVIII: Germany details
7:02 World Update XVIII: Austria details
9:33 World Update XVIII: Switzerland details
11:46 Local Legend 19
12:31 ATR updates
12:46 Famous Flyer 10: Boeing 707-320C
13:36 Review of updated roadmap and World Update XIX
